Touchscreens to order fast food
By Mark Frauenfelder at 8:45 pm Tuesday, Feb 21 Abir Majumdar says: "I went to one of those Taco Bell/KFC hybrids in Morrisville, NC and all the ordering was done through the gigantic touchscreens. No humans take orders there. You go to the machines and you're presented by an animated Colonel and talking taco. Then you put in an order as if you were at amazon. You can pay with cash and credit card." Link Share this post Tweet Pin It
